about_the_game:
Help Mr. and Mrs. Hermit on their heartfelt journey to a better life. Solve puzzles, overcome challenges, and protect what you love.



Broken Shell is a cute and cozy adventure game follows the love story of two little hermit crabs searching for a new home. Despite human interference in their habitat, they face challenges leading to their separation. Embark on adventures, meet new friends, and assist diverse characters, all through solving puzzles and mini-games, a combination of humorous narrative events within a heartfelt romantic drama without a single word.

GAME FEATURES:

  • Heartwarming Story: Join Mr. & Mrs. Hermit on a love-filled journey, depicted through stunning hand-drawn paintings and animations, suitable for all ages.

  • Challenging Puzzles and Mini Games: Encounter thought-provoking obstacles that demand logic and problem-solving skills to progress.

  • Diverse Characters: Interact with a colorful cast, adding depth and humor to the narrative.

  • Environmental Message: Explore the consequences of human negligence, highlighting the impact of pollution on animal life.

  • Love and Resilience: Witness the power of determination and teamwork in overcoming adversity, leaving players with a heartwarming and memorable experience.



Foggy Studio is dedicated to crafting immersive animated adventure games that push boundaries. We poured our hearts into creating this game, and we hope you'll enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed making it.
